rtaxref 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Reference

Taxa Functions

Functions to retrieve TaxRef data by Taxa

rt_taxa_autocomplete()

Retrieve Synonyms associated with a Taxon

rt_taxa_children()

Retrieve a taxon children

rt_taxa_externalids()

Retrieve IDs of the taxon in external databases

rt_taxa_from_externalids()

Retrieve Taxon using the ids from external databases

rt_taxa_fuzzymatch()

Find taxa by fuzzy matching their scientific Name

rt_taxa_id()

Retrieve a taxon information using its id

rt_taxa_interactions()

Retrieve Interactions of taxon with other taxa

rt_taxa_media()

Retrieve Media (photos & others) Associated with a Taxon

rt_taxa_parent()

Retrieve classification above the taxon

rt_taxa_search()

Search fo a taxon information

rt_taxa_sources()

Retrieve Sources Associated with a Taxon

rt_taxa_status()

Retrieve Taxon Conservation Status

rt_taxa_synomyms()

Retrieve Synonyms associated with a Taxon

rt_taxa_taxrefhistory()

Retrieve history of a taxon through TaxRef versions

rt_taxa_vernacular()

Retrieve VernacularNames associated with a Taxon

Status Functions

Functions to retrieve TaxRef data by Status

rt_status_find_type()

Retrieve the status of all Taxa according to a Status Type

rt_status_opgroup()

Retrieve the status of all Taxa in an Operational Group

rt_status_search()

Search statuses based on a list of criteria

rt_status_type()

Retrieve all Status Types

rt_status_type_id()

Retrieve a Status Types based on its id

Interactions functions

Functions to retrieve TaxRef interaction data

rt_interactions_find_type()

Retrieve the status of all Taxa according to a Status Type

rt_interactions_opgroup()

Retrieve the interactions of all Taxa in an Operational Group

rt_interactions_search()

Search Interactions based on a list of criteria

rt_interactions_type()

Retrieve all Interactions Types

rt_interactions_type_id()

Retrieve a interactions Types based on its id

Sources functions

Functions to retrieve TaxRef sources data

rt_sources_find_term()

Search a source from a term

rt_sources_id()

Retrieve a taxon information using its id

rt_sources_match()

Search a source from a citation by fuzzy matchin

Thesaurus functions

Functions that list categories used in TaxRef

rt_biogeo_status()

Retrieve the list of biogeographic statuses used in TaxRef

rt_biogeo_status_id()

Retrieve a biogeographic status used in TaxRef

rt_external_db()

Retrieve the list of external DBs referenced in TaxRef

rt_external_db_id()

Retrieve an external database referenced in TaxRef

rt_habitats()

Retrieve the list of habitats used in TaxRef

rt_habitats_id()

Retrieve a habitat used in TaxRef

rt_langages()

Retrieve the list of langages used in TaxRef

rt_langages_id()

Retrieve a habitat used in TaxRef

rt_operational_groups()

Retrieve the list of operational groups used in TaxRef

rt_operational_groups_id()

Retrieve an operational group used in TaxRef

rt_source_uses()

Retrieve the list of source uses in TaxRef

rt_source_uses_id()

Retrieve a source use in TaxRef

rt_taxo_ranks()

Retrieve the list of taxonomic ranks in TaxRef

rt_taxo_ranks_id()

Retrieve a taxonomic rank used in TaxRef

rt_taxref_versions()

Retrieve the list of existing TaxRef versions

rt_taxref_versions_id()

Retrieve information about a TaxRef version

rt_vernacular_groups()

Retrieve the list of vernacular groups in TaxRef
